markdown.markdown:
I'm **Akosua Anima Osei-Sempremoo**, an MBA candidate with a strong foundation in finance, accounting, and business development. I bring a unique blend of professional experience in financial management, sales strategy, and regulatory compliance to drive organizational success. With extensive experience in financial consulting and sales management, I've developed expertise in financial analysis, customer relationship management, and strategic planning. I'm currently expanding my business acumen through my MBA studies to further enhance my leadership capabilities and pursue my career goals in financial management. --- ## üéì Education
**MBA Candidate**, University Canada West *Expected Graduation: 2025*
**B.Sc. Business Administration (Accounting)**, Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology *Graduated: 2021*
**HND in Accounting**, Accra Technical University *Graduated: 2016*
--- ## üíº Professional Experience
**Junior Finance Consultant** ‚Äì The Receivership of 347 Microfinance Institutions (PwC) *Ghana | July 2019 ‚Äì August 2023* - Oversaw and supervised financial transactions, ensuring accuracy and compliance with internal and regulatory guidelines - Monitored and projected organizational cash flow to ensure resource adequacy for operations and long-term stability - Prepared payment vouchers and memos for all expenditures, streamlining payment processes - Compiled comprehensive schedules for utilities and expenses across operating branches for effective budget management - Updated the cashbook with daily financial entries for accurate and timely financial reporting - Ensured compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and standards to minimize legal and financial risks - Served as liaison between finance department and other organizational units - Provided financial management support for projects, including budgeting, forecasting, and analysis
**Sales and Marketing Manager** ‚Äì Ataa Maame Enterprise *Accra, Ghana | January 2020 ‚Äì June 2023* - Developed and implemented comprehensive sales and marketing strategies aligned with business objectives - Established and maintained relationships with suppliers and industry partners to explore new commercial ventures - Created and preserved strong relationships with existing and new customers - Managed sales and marketing budgets to ensure effective resource allocation for maximum ROI - Provided excellent customer service by assessing customer needs to recommend appropriate products - Managed store displays and merchandising to enhance product visibility and sales
**Trade Promoter, Sales** ‚Äì Guinness Ghana Brewery PLC (Diageo) *Accra, Ghana | September 2016 ‚Äì September 2017* - Led product promotions by developing and implementing strategies within target markets - Managed daily, weekly, and monthly sales reports, setting and achieving sales targets - Conducted thorough audits of sales transactions to ensure accuracy and integrity - Produced comprehensive weekly, monthly, and quarterly performance reports - Cultivated enduring relationships with diverse high-net-worth clients - Conducted market research to understand customer preferences and market trends - Engaged with existing and potential customers to introduce Guinness products - Collaborated with retailers and distributors to ensure product visibility and adequate supply
**Intern (Audit)** ‚Äì The Registrar General Department *Ghana | June 2015 ‚Äì August 2015* - Assisted in examining and validating financial and administrative documents - Input financial data into auditing systems and helped with preliminary data analysis - Provided administrative assistance to the audit team, including scheduling and documentation - Drafted memorandums and maintained audit files
**Intern (Accounting)** ‚Äì Forestry Commission Ghana *Ghana | June 2014 ‚Äì August 2014* - Assisted in recording financial transactions from invoices, receipts, and other documents - Contributed to the preparation of basic financial statements under senior guidance - Managed financial documents, including filing and organizing accounting records - Assisted in monitoring operational expenses and preparing expenditure reports - Supported internal audits by gathering necessary documents and verification of records
--- ## üõ†Ô∏è Skills
Project Management Strategic Analysis Data Visualization (Excel, Power BI) Communication & Leadership Financial Analysis and Reporting Data Processing and Management Attention to Detail Regulatory Compliance Relationship Management Confidentiality & Ethics Documentation Team Collaboration Customer Service Sales & Product Promotion Problem-solving Financial Management
--- ## üì¨ Contact {#contact}
üìß Email: [akosua.animaosei@gmail.com](mailto:akosua.animaosei@gmail.com) üì± Phone: +233 20 658 3994
